#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;

int main()
{

  int t,n,x,rez;

  scanf("%d", &t);
  while(t--)
  {
    scanf("%d", &n);
    rez = -1;
    vector<int> citire(n);

    for(int i=0; i<n; ++i)
    {
      scanf("%d", &x);
      citire[i] = 3*x;
    }
    for(int i=0; i<n; ++i)
    {
      scanf("%d", &x);
      citire[i] += x;
      if(citire[i]>rez)
        rez = citire[i];
    }
    printf("%d\n", rez);
  }

  return 0;
}
